archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: PAC Invoicing
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Indicium Solutions https://www.indiciumsolutions.com.mx/
PAC means CFDI Authorized Certification Provider (Proveedor Autorizado de Certificación de CFDI), is an organization with SAT (Servicio de Administración Tributaria) authorization to validate, assign a fiscal folio and put a SAT's digital stamp on invoices.
